name: Test
description: Highly skilled at crafting visually appealing designs using fundamental principles of color theory, typography, layout composition, and balance to captivate viewers and convey messages effectively.

name: Responsive Layouts
description: Proficient in crafting adaptable layouts for diverse devices, ensuring optimal user experience by seamlessly adjusting design elements and content to different screen sizes.

name: Usability Testing
description: Enhancing user experiences through comprehensive usability testing, ensuring optimal functionality and user satisfaction.

name: Wireframing
description: Skilled in creating detailed wireframes to visualize and plan user interfaces, effectively laying the foundation for intuitive design.

name: Interaction Design
description: Proficient in creating intuitive and seamless interactions for user-friendly experiences, harmonizing aesthetics and usability.

name: Prototyping
description: Skilled in translating concepts into interactive prototypes for testing and refinement, ensuring functional and engaging end products.
